Text:
Anybody know where I can learn how to use those srt files? Or what program I need to use?

I wonder if this easier to find in Finland than America. I haven't seen it anywhere in the U.S. 

Thank you bob-ic!!!

This movie is very hard to come by, so thank you very much for uploading it. I only saw it once in German about 10 years ago and I really can't wait to see it again. 
I especially remember the scene when the manager sits in the restaurant eating steak with the bar owner (Duke Robbilard) while the band sits outside sharing an union, great humor!!

Thank you bob-ic for this great movie.
Greetings from Flowerpower1946 in Holland.
@ elwood 27: use vlcplayer or kmplayer and rename the srt files to the same name as the movie and off you go! enjoy and greets from holland

Thank You bob-ic. The  only other torrent is a 4.16 GB version. 

Greetings from New Delhi, India.
